specialBuffDetails.name: Bleed
specialBuffDetails.description: Deals damage at the start of the turn (based on the applying attack), then half of the bleeding stacks are removed (rounded up)

skillDetailsWithMonstersList.skillDescription: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.
Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison, Burn or Congeal damage, there is a 75% chance to apply a Bleed stack equal to that damage.
Aura: Whenever an allied Occult or Mage Monster hits an enemy, 35% chance to inflict a Bleed stack equal to 35% of that damage.
Aura: When an allied Aquatic Monster is hit, 35% chance to inflict a Bleed stack onto the attacker equal to the damage received.
Aura: Critical Hits of Aquatic Monsters apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.
Aura: Your Monsters deal 10% more damage when attacking an enemy with Bleed stacks.
Aura: When allied Beasts or Reptiles spend a turn without attacking, apply Bleed on enemies equal to 5% of their current Health. (2% vs. Champions, Infinity Arena)
When getting hit there is a 35% chance to apply a stack of Bleed onto the attacker equal to the damage received.
